column1: The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word interview with the CEO of this company who admits to lying about the two most important specific points in this disclosure and explains why with an embarrassing story that involves a {noun}. Start with a question from an interviewer. At the end of the text
column2: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion including the word {noun};The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word interview with the CEO of this company's spouse who tells the story of the CEO confessing to lying about two specific points in this disclosure because of a weird encounter with a {noun}. Start with a question from an interviewer. At the end of the text
column3: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion including the word {noun};The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word monologue from the perspective of the CEO's dog about how much more the CEO cares about playing with {noun} which makes the dog skeptical about the truth of one of the facts in this disclosure which the dog criticizes from the perspective of {famous_person}. Open from the dog's perspective. At the end of the text
column4: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion; The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word interview with the CEO of this company who admits to lying about the two most important specific points in this disclosure and explains why with an embarrassing story that involves a {noun} used by {famous_person} who makes a cameo appearance at the end of the interview. Start with a question from an interviewer. At the end of the text
column5: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion including the word {noun};The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word interview with the CEO of this company conducted by {famous_person} wherein the CEO admits to lying about two important specific points in this disclosure. {famous_person} is upset with the CEO and using examples from {famous_person}'s life
column6: tries to guide the CEO onto a better path. The CEO's response reveals hatred of {famous_person}. Start with a question from an interviewer. At the end of the text
column7: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion;The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word discussion between the CEO of this company and the CEO's spouse involving a {adjective} {noun} wherein the CEO admits to lying in the disclosure. Start with a statement from the CEO's spouse. At the end of the text
